Text: A seeder or two online would help. Only about 50 of us waiting to d/l
Thank you very much. I am a big fan of Lee Child, among others, and appreciate your efforts.

Yes, would be very nice if "batman" seeded his own torrent.  

Simply posting it isn't sufficient - the files don't magically appear on our PCs, you actually have to seed long enough for a complete copy to upload.
Thanks, complete now and will seed.
